EXTRACT.</br>Syr Johne, a Knyghte, who hath a barne of Lore,</br>Kenns Latyne at fyrste syghte from Frenche or Greke,</br>Tortures his Knowledge for ten Years or more,</br>To rynge upon the Latyne Worde to speke:</br>Whoever speke the Englysch is despised,</br>The Englysch hym to please, must fyrst be Latynyzed.

PARODY.</br>Caelya a Nymphe of mickle Witte, and Faire:</br>Kenns Fashyonne at fyrste syghte; from France ne doubt;</br>Nice to a poynte; the placynge of a Hair;</br>And never failynge every public Route:</br>What pity she to Anglo is ally'd!</br>The Englysch her to please, must fyrste be Frencheifyed.</br>
